column9: Purchase tickets early and arrive early. Contact MAW Hawaii office for details on special tour. Handicap-accessible. Be prepared for lots of walking.
You must be at least 7 years old to participate. Close-toed shoes required. You must weigh under 270 lbs to participate.
Children 3-7 must be accompanied in water by adult. Biogradeable sunscreen only. Bring prepared to get wet. Handicap accessibility is limited.
Snorkel gear is available for rent on location. Handicap-accessible. Beach wheelchairs are available and free of charge.
Various dinner cruise options available including kid-friendly activites. Check in 30 minutes prior to departure.
Dress in a manner that is respectful of its cultural and historical significance. Shirts and footwear are required; no bathing suits or beachwear. Children under 5 are free.
Children under 4 are free. No large packpacks or bags permitted. Check out the Planetarium too!
The zoo is 42 acres; be prepared for lots of walking!
